marklogic.body: I love these comment boards I get to read how "The Masses" feel about what is happening in the news. I see the raw hate, anger, and ignorance. It seems like most of the comments are made by little insignificant people who hide behind a screen name and inflate their egos with how many "likes" they receive. They are the faceless mob carrying the torches and Shouting "Burn the witch, heretic, infidel, (fill in the blank with the hot topic of the day). They will never be true leaders because they fear the responsibility and consequences of being in the public eye.
